Token.Abstract: The protocol a class must conform to in order to receive callbacks from the HealthLookaheadUITextFieldDelegate's network requests.
Performed after the User hits the Return key on their keyboard. The text currently in the text field is sent back and the keyboard is closed automatically.

Parameter.Name: text
Parameter.Abstract: the text that is in the text field

Token.Abstract: As the User types, an API request is made, when that comes back, the JSON is transformed into an array of strings. These strings are the description of any medication relating to what the User has typed. It is up to the developer on how to display these suggested medication names.

Parameter.Name: suggestions
Parameter.Abstract: the array of medications as strings
